src_original: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṅghapuraskṛto rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
yāvad bhagavatā sābhisaṃskāraṃ nagaradvāre pādaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ /  dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ sābhisaṃskāraṃ nagaradvāramindrakīle pādau vyavasthāpayanti /
badhirāḥ śrotragrahaṇasamarthā bhavanti /  paṅgavo gamanasamarthā bhavanti /
